Container.Name: UpsBoard
Container.Description: UpsBoard allows you to monitor your Usenet services: SABnzbd, Sick Beard, CouchPotato, Plex, and your system: CPU Usage, Memory Usage, Bandwidth Usage, and Disk Space Usage[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is used to store the configuration file of UpStatBoard.
